messages.message: What is the easiest way to give someone access to just a folder? I am think about how I copy over POC results for a user to look over with their username? If I copy and paste and they don’t have access to the underlying information they will get pemission errors (Or will they). What is the easiest way to share large volume POC resultx?
this would be to use our ACL system  Provide permissions to a folder within that JSON spec — can show you in person
